description.value:
At 3rd level, your mastery of your ki allows you to summon a portion of your astral self. As a bonus action, you can spend 1 @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.imsZ2GYUPlwCQqqy]{ki point} to summon the arms of your astral self. When you do so, each creature of your choice that you can see within 10 feet of you must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take force damage equal to two rolls of your @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.TMeKDQLocSb3loVv]{Martial Arts} die.

For 10 minutes, these spectral arms hover near your shoulders or surround your arms (your choice). You determine the arms' appearance, and they vanish early if you are incapacitated or die.

While the spectral arms are present, you gain the following benefits:

  • You can use your Wisdom modifier in place of your Strength modifier when making Strength checks and Strength saving throws.
  • You can use the spectral arms to make unarmed strikes.
  • When you make an unarmed strike with the arms on your turn, your reach for it is 5 feet greater than normal.
  • The unarmed strikes you make with the arms can use your Wisdom modifier in place of your Strength or Dexterity modifier for the attack and damage rolls, and their damage type is force.

Note: After adding this feature ro your character, set Resource Consumption to Item Uses: Ki.

You will need to manually change the damage done by this feature at higher levels.

You can use these custom features to utilize the abilities provided by your spectral arms:

@Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.1uC8PK6PLAJZh745]{Deft Fists}

@Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.l2ZruMGzvSZjXD1a]{Strike}
